thread.title: BRIEF-International Seaways Q4 Loss Per Share $3.12

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-International Seaways Q4 Loss Per Share $3.12
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - International Seaways Inc:
* INTERNATIONAL SEAWAYS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.33 EXCLUDING ITEMS * QUARTERLY CONSOLIDATED TCE REVENUES $65.1 MILLION, COMPARED TO $82.2 MILLION
* QUARTERLY SHIPPING REVENUES WERE $69.4 MILLION, COMPARED TO $85.8 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.38, REVENUE VIEW $66.2 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
